entry.title: HTLCs using OP_CHECKSEQUENCEVERIFY/OP_LOCKTIMEVERIFY and revocation hashes.
entry.summary: In the original draft paper, private keys were mentioned as a means of revoking transactions. However, now "revocation preimages" are used instead of sending pubkeys. This design change is considered an improvement over the original method.
